Talks & Other Engagements

2020

Talk: Stochastic Approximations to Stochastic Fluid Processes. ACEMS Annual Retreat, Virtual meeting, 2020. Slides.

Talk: A Brief Intro To Data Science In Julia. Postgraduate Seminar, School of Mathematical Sciences, The University of Adelaide, 2020.

2019

Talk: Approximations to Generators of Stochastic Fluid Models. AustMS 63rd Annual meeting, Monash University, Melbourne, 2019. Slides.

Talk: What do probability, disease and energy have in common? ACEMS Free Public Lecture, The University of Adelaide, 2019. Slides.

Talk: An algorithm for inference of a class of Markovian Regime-Switching Models. APS-INFORMS conference, Brisbane, Queensland, Australia, 2019. Slides.

Talk: Maths is trendy: Trend estimation and signal processing. Postgraduate Seminar, School of Mathematical Sciences, The University of Adelaide, 2019. Slides.

Talk: Trend estimation for Markovian Regime-Switching models for electricity prices. ANZIAM annual conference, Nelson NZ, 2019. Slides.

2018

Participant: Planning, valuation and optimisation of long-distance electricity transmission lines. Maths in Industry Study Group (MISG), Adelaide, 2018. About: utilised stochastic linear programming to value long-distance power transmission lines.

Talk: An algorithm for inference of a class of Markovian Regime-Switching Models. AustMS annual 62nd Annual meeting, The University of Adelaide, 2018. Slides.

Talk: Independent Markov chains on a Markov chain and MRS models for electricity prices. Postgraduate Seminar, School of Mathematical Sciences, The University of Adelaide, 2018. Slides.

Talk: Markovian Regime-Switching Models for South Australian Wholesale Electricity Prices. ANZIAM annual conference, Hobart, 2018. Slides.

2017

Talk: Markovian Regime-Switching Models for South Australian Wholesale Electricity Prices. Young European Queuing Theorists Winterschool on Energy Systems, TU/e, Netherlands, 2017. Slides.

Talk: A model for South Australian electricity prices. ANZIAM SA mini-meeting. Adelaide, South Australia, 2017. Slides.

Poster: A Model for South Australian Electricity Spot Prices. Ingenuity, The University of Adelaide, 2017 & Stoneham prize, School of Mathematics, The University of Adelaide. Poster, Slides.

Participant: Optimisation of electricity microgrid controllers. Maths in Industry Study Group (MISG), Adelaide, 2017. About: utilised linear programming to optimise the use of battery storage systems for small communities of cooperative households.

Talk: Pseudo-Marginal Markov Chain Monte Carlo for Bayesian Inference. Postgraduate Seminar, School of Mathematical Sciences, The University of Adelaide, 2017. Slides.

Talk: Modelling Electricity Prices Using Regime Switching Models. ANZIAM annual conference, Hahndorf, South Australia, 2017. Slides.

2016

Participant: AMSI Vacation Research Student. Approximating heavy-tailed distributions with Phase-type distributions with infinitely many phases. 2016. About: I was awarded a scholarship to conduct research over the summer break at The University of Adelaide, working with Dr. Giang Nguyen and Prof. Joshua Ross.
